full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I RNAM THAR BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,CES MKHAS SHING GRUB PA BRNYES PA, BDAG GI YONGS 'DZIN CHEN PO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI RNAM PAR THAR BA CUNG ZAD BSDEBS PA 'DI, RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS DANG ,BLA MA 'DI'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS NOD PA MANG DU THOS PA'I DGE SLONG CHOS LDAN RAB 'BYOR GYIS SNANG BA THAMS CAD SGYU MAR RTOGS SHING , SRID GSUM DRI ZA'I GONG KHYER LTAR GZIGS NAS TSE 'DI BLOS BTANG GI SGRUB PA SNYING POR MDZAD PA, RJE BTZUN RED MDA' BA'I SGRUB GNAS GANGS BU LA'I MGUL RGYAN DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA SPYI DANG , KHYAD PAR DU YANG RJE YAB SRAS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG , RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , DGE'O, ,BSAM DON CHOS LDAN YID BZHIN DU 'GRUB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,AOm SVA STI, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD BYIR SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING , ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,
